revised_title: Trypanosoma Simice: Susceptibility of Various Animals and Virulence
tldr: The article discusses the trypanosome species Trypanosoma simice and its effects on various animals. It highlights the susceptibility of warthogs and domestic animals to the parasite, as well as the rapid change in virulence when passing through different hosts. The study also notes the importance of tsetse flies in transmitting the disease.
